GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
iommu/mediatek: Remove clk_disable in mtk_iommu_remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 053465ab20dcd324a43a1811ee98e5721e6a3e65, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit b34ea31fe013569d42b7e8681ef3f717f77c5b72. For more details please see the references link.
